camera_gear.model: Phase One XF IQ4 150MP Camera System (Medium Format)
camera_gear.lens: Schneider Kreuznach 35mm LS f/3.5 Blue Ring Lens with Tilt-Shift movements applied for perspective correction
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/125 sec (ISO 50)
camera_gear.aperture: f/11 (for deep depth of field and optimal sharpness across the frame)

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Mid-day / Early Afternoon (approx. 13:00 - 14:00), creating strong definition
lighting_setup.weather: Clear, cloudless blue sky with high visibility (CAVOK)
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Hard direct sunlight striking from the top-right (approx. 60 degrees azimuth, 50 degrees elevation), creating distinct cast shadows and brilliant reflections
lighting_setup.quality: High contrast, specular, revealing form and texture through strong highlights and deep shadows
lighting_setup.artificial_light: None active (daylight dominance)

color_grading.palette: Naturalistic and vibrant architectural palette. Dominant cool cyan/blue tones from sky and glass reflections.
color_grading.saturation: Medium-High saturation, true-to-life but punchy hues
color_grading.contrast: High global contrast, with deep blacks in shadowed recesses and brilliant specular highlights on the glazed surfaces

texture_quality.details: Ultra-high definition photographic fidelity. Every architectural element is resolved sharply, real human face.
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Reflective glass showing distorted sky reflections; asphalt road grain; distinct individual leaves on urban greenery, fabric textures on people's clothing.

atmosphere.mood: Imposing, clean, modern, professional, clarity, aspirational
atmosphere.feeling: A sense of impressive scale and contemporary urban development under idealized conditions.

technical_quality.post_processing: Rigorous architectural cleanup. Full keystone correction (verticals perfectly parallel). Chromatic aberration removal. Highlight recovery applied to glass reflections to prevent clipping. Shadow detail lifted slightly in the lower podium area.
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight balanced (5500K), neutral gray point
technical_quality.tone: Slight S-curve applied for tonal separation, emphasizing mid-tone details in the building materials
technical_quality.vignette: Zero vignetting, edge-to-edge brightness consistency
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Extremely high dynamic range, achieved through exposure bracketing and blending to capture details from the brightest cloudless sky down to the deepest street-level shadows.

camera_gear.lens: Rodenstock HR Digaron-W 32mm f/4 Tilt-Shift

camera_gear.model: Sony Alpha 7R V (61MP Full-frame sensor for high dynamic range in backlit situations)
camera_gear.lens: Canon TS-E 24mm f/3.5L II (via adapter) - Tilt-Shift lens essential for keeping vertical lines parallel
camera_gear.sensor: Back-illuminated CMOS (Exmor R) to handle the extreme contrast of looking into the sun
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/250 sec (To balance the bright sun and freeze the movement of pedestrians)
camera_gear.aperture: f/16 (Small aperture is critical here to create the distinct 'Sunstar' / diffraction spike effect on the sun burst)

technical_quality.tone: Luminous and airy, despite the strong contrast.
technical_quality.vignette: None.

technical_quality.tone: Rich tonality with lifted shadow details to reveal subjects in the foreground, despite the bright backlight.
technical_quality.vignette: Slight natural lens fall-off at the corners to draw focus to the bulding.
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Very High Dynamic Range (HDR) capture strategy used to balance the direct sun against the shaded undercrofts of the shadows.

color_grading.saturation: Low saturation on architecture

texture_quality.details: Sharp definition of architectural materials，Real world materials, real human face.
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Reflective glass,fabric textures on people's clothing, volumetric fluffy clouds

atmosphere.feeling: The weight of architecture, a moment of clarity amidst chaos

technical_quality.post_processing: Black & White conversion style grading but keeping subtle color, dodge and burn to enhance geometry
technical_quality.white_balance: 5500K (Daylight)
technical_quality.tone: High contrast curve, crushed blacks for silhouettes
technical_quality.vignette: Natural optical shading used as a compositional tool
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High Dynamic Range needed to retain cloud detail while keeping shadows rich

camera_gear.lens: Rodenstock HR Digaron-W 40mm f/4 (Zero distortion technical lens)
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/2 sec (Tripod mounted, long exposure to soak up the ambient light)
camera_gear.aperture: f/11 (Deep depth of field to keep the foreground snow and background sharp)
camera_gear.iso: ISO 50 (Cleanest possible signal, no noise in the flat grey sky)

lighting_setup.weather: Heavy overcast, flat grey sky, diffused soft light, deep freeze atmosphere,thin mist.
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Frontal soft ambient fill vs. Soft internal lighting
lighting_setup.quality: Shadowless environmental light allowing the interior lights to act as the main subject
lighting_setup.artificial_light: 2700K Cool lights inside, creating a 'yellow box' effect

color_grading.palette: Low Contrast Complementary: Cool Grey/Cyan (Exterior) vs. Yellow (Interior)
color_grading.saturation: Desaturated environment (Monochromatic feel) vs. Saturated cool interior
color_grading.contrast: Low contrast, preserving the softness of the snow

texture_quality.details: High-frequency detail in the building's texture, glass reflection,real human face.
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Smooth pristine snow surface, glass reflecting winter sky and surrounding， fabric textures on people's clothing.

composition_guide.balance: Perfect symmetry, main cubic volume centered, flanked by lower wings
composition_guide.framing: Wide framing to include the surrounding snowscape and tree line context

atmosphere.mood: Inviting, Peaceful, Solitary, Warm within Cold
atmosphere.feeling: A safe haven in a harsh winter landscape, architectural purity

technical_quality.post_processing: Perspective correction (verticals perfectly straight), highlight recovery on interior lights
technical_quality.white_balance: 3500K (Keeping the snow cool white/grey to contrast with the warm interior)
technical_quality.tone: High-key brilliance in the center, soft falloff towards edges
technical_quality.vignette: Very subtle, natural falloff to focus eye on the central entrance
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High Dynamic Range (HDR)

camera_gear.lens: Sony FE 24-70mm f/2.8 GM II (at 35mm focal length)
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/60 sec (handheld capable, balancing exposure for the bright snow)
camera_gear.aperture: f/8.0 (optimal sharpness for both the wood texture and the background)
camera_gear.iso: ISO 200 (retaining dynamic range in the snow highlights)

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Winter Blue Hour / Early Morning Twilight
lighting_setup.weather: Freezing overcast, soft diffuse sky, snow coverage
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Soft, omnidirectional cool skylight (shadowless illumination)
lighting_setup.quality: Ethereal, low-contrast ambient light that wraps around the building
lighting_setup.artificial_light: None / Pure natural light (emphasizing the raw material color)

color_grading.palette: Classic Complementary: Icy Blue/Cyan (Environment) vs. Warm Ochre/Amber (Wood)
color_grading.saturation: Vibrant indoor lighting against a desaturated, cool background
color_grading.contrast: Medium-High Color Contrast, but Low Luma Contrast (soft shadows)

texture_quality.details: High-frequency detail in the building's texture, glass reflection,real human face, soft powdery texture of snow
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Smooth pristine snow surface, glass reflecting winter sky and surrounding， fabric textures on people's clothing.

composition_guide.framing: Contextual framing with foreground snow coverage

atmosphere.feeling: The quiet solitude of a winter retreat, Scandinavian hygge

technical_quality.post_processing: Cool white balance bias, selective color boost for oranges/yellows
technical_quality.white_balance: 4500K (Allowing the snow to appear blue/cool to enhance the winter feel)
technical_quality.tone: High-key histogram (bright image) but preserving snow texture
technical_quality.vignette: Subtle frost-like vignette or natural lens falloff
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High Dynamic Range to prevent snow blowout

camera_gear.lens: Fujinon GF 32-64mm f/4 R LM WR (at 35mm equivalent)
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/30 sec (Slow shutter to capture visible rain streaks and motion blur of the pedestrian and car)
camera_gear.aperture: f/11 (Deep depth of field)
camera_gear.iso: ISO 400 (Compensating for the a rainy day)

lighting_setup.weather: Light rain, misty atmosphere, overcast cloudy sky, high humidity
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Top-down soft diffuse skylight (Shadowless)
lighting_setup.quality: Flat, low-contrast global illumination, soft occlusion shadows
lighting_setup.artificial_light: None / Natural daylight only (Lights off to emphasize the natural texture)

color_grading.palette: Desaturated Cool Tones (Slate Grey, Wet floor, Muted Sage Green)
color_grading.saturation: Low saturation (Bleach Bypass look), emphasizing textures over colors
color_grading.contrast: Low global contrast but high micro-contrast (clarity) on wet surfaces

texture_quality.details: Visible rain streaks, water ripples, wet glass reflectivity，real human face，Pedestrians holding umbrellas.
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Puddles reflecting the building, fabric textures on people's clothing.

composition_guide.framing: According to the content of the picture

atmosphere.feeling: The quiet perseverance of architecture

technical_quality.post_processing: Cool tone mapping, motion blur enhancement on figures, rain particle simulation
technical_quality.white_balance: 6500K (Cool/Blue bias to enhance the rainy feeling)
technical_quality.tone: Mid-tone heavy histogram, soft whites (no blown highlights)
technical_quality.vignette: Subtle atmospheric haze fading into the background
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Standard dynamic range, preserving the softness of the grey sky

camera_gear.lens: Schneider Kreuznach 35mm LS f/3.5 Blue Ring Tilt-Shift
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/500s (to freeze heavy rain streaks)
camera_gear.aperture: f/11 (deep depth of field for edge-to-edge sharpness)

lighting_setup.weather: Torrential Downpour, Cumulonimbus Overcast
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Omnidirectional Diffused Skylight
lighting_setup.quality: Soft but Heavy, Flat Light with High Specular Highlights on wet surfaces
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Subtle cool interior lights (30% opacity), lights reflecting on wet ground

color_grading.palette: Monochromatic Slate Grey, Steel Blue, Anthracite, Cool Cyan undertones
color_grading.saturation: Low (-25%), Desaturated
color_grading.contrast: High, Crushed Blacks, punchy highlights

texture_quality.details: High-fidelity raindrops on glass, volumetric rain fog, slick wet ground reflections,Pedestrians holding umbrellas,The tires of a moving car raise water vapor,real human face.
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Highly reflective glazing, metallic framing，fabric textures on people's clothing.

composition_guide.balance: Vertical dominance with leading lines from the street wetness

atmosphere.feeling: Cold, Isolation, Urban Solitude

technical_quality.post_processing: Bleach Bypass look, High Clarity, Structure boost, Dehaze for building outline
technical_quality.white_balance: Cool / 4500K
technical_quality.tone: Low-key, Moody
technical_quality.vignette: Subtle lens falloff to center attention
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High Dynamic Range (HDR) to retain details in dark clouds and glass reflections
